name: Robotic Swarm Control Lab
tagline: Robotics & Control at the University of Houston
body:
### Purpose
The Robotic Swarm Control Lab (RSCL) in the [Electrical and Computer Engineering Department at the University of Houston](http://www.ee.uh.edu/) exists to
- understand, quantify, and implement the best methods for controlling huge numbers of robots
- implement robotic solutions to medical problems
-  train confident, productive, ethical engineers to perform research with impact

### About us
Humans perform better in teams <sup>citation needed</sup>, and we believe large numbers of robots working together can improve our world.  To learn more about our work, browse through 
 our YouTube channel [youtube.com/aabecker5/](www.youtube.com/aabecker5/), [Mathematica Demonstrations](http://demonstrations.wolfram.com/author.html?author=Aaron+Becker),
Gamification research [SwarmControl.net](www.SwarmControl.net), 
and papers: [scholar.google.com/Aaron T Becker](scholar.google.com/citations?user=6kGt1DEAAAAJ).
